description: A permissions plugin for Minecraft servers.
wikiLocaleWarning: Note: the wiki is only available in English.
localeUpdate: New! Use the LuckPerms website in your preferred language. See our Discord for more info.
sponsor:
Proudly sponsored by BisectHosting.
Create your own Minecraft server today!

home.name: Home
home.supported: Supports Bukkit/Spigot/Paper, BungeeCord, Sponge, Fabric, Forge, Nukkit and Velocity servers

why.title: Why LuckPerms?
why.description: LuckPerms is a permissions plugin for Minecraft servers. It allows server admins to control what features players can use by creating groups and assigning permissions.
why.fast: fast - written with performance and scalability in mind.
why.reliable: reliable - trusted by thousands of server admins, and the largest of server networks.
why.easy: easy to use - setup permissions using commands, directly in config files, or using the web editor.
why.flexible: flexible - supports a variety of data storage options, and works on lots of different server types.
why.extensive: extensive - a plethora of customization options and settings which can be changed to suit your server.
why.free: free - available for download and usage at no cost, and permissively licensed so it can remain free forever.
why.more: For more information, see the wiki article on {wiki}

apps.title: Web Apps
apps.description1: This site hosts a number of extra web applications which work with the plugin.
apps.description2: These applications are designed to work for all users, even those without the ability to install/host an application on their own web server.

home.wiki: Learn how to install, setup, configure and effectively use LuckPerms
home.github: Browse the source code, report issues and contribute to the project
home.discord: Join {count} others to discuss the project and ask/answer questions
home.patreon: Join {count} others supporting the project on Patreon

partner.title: Create your own Minecraft Server
partner.description: Easily create your very own Minecraft Server with our hosting partner, Bisect Hosting!

install.title: How to install
install.add: Add the downloaded plugin .jar file into your server's plugins or mods folder.
install.restart: Start or restart your server - do not reload!
install.config: Locate the plugin's configuration file (usually found within /plugins/LuckPerms/) and adjust any settings to your liking.
install.setup: Start setting up your permissions! Check out the {wiki} guide for more info.

trouble.title: Having trouble installing?
trouble.console: Make sure to check your console for any error messages - especially during start up
trouble.read: Check the more detailed {wiki} wiki page to see if you need to perform any additional steps.
trouble.support: If all else fails, get in touch with us on {discord} and we'll be happy to help.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: Extensions can modify the behaviour of LuckPerms, you can read more about them on {wiki}.
extensions.legacyInfo: Allows some common API methods to be used by plugins that haven't upgraded to v5 version of the API yet.
extensions.more: Check out the {wiki} for more information!
extensions.defaultAssignmentsInfo: Provides an alternate approach for assigning {wiki} if the recommended way is impractical.

editor.start: To start a new editor session, use one of the following commands:
editor.command: Run this command on your server to apply the changes:
editor.applyNote: Note: after running the applyedits command, you should generate another editor URL to continue editing your server's permissions.

reusedsession.title: Reused Session
reusedsession.desc: This session has been used (opened & saved) already!
reusedsession.desc2: Therefore, it may contain outdated data that no longer reflects the plugin storage. The recommended course of action is to create a new editor session and start afresh.

trust.title: Editor Connection
trust.prompt: In order to trust this web browser and allow it to apply changes directly to your server, please run the following command in-game:
trust.note: Note: You only have to do this once! The server will remember this browser for future sessions.

groups.name: Group name
groups.choose: Choose a group or user from the side bar
groups.delete: Are you sure you want to delete group: {group}
groups.deleteConfirm: All {count} of its permissions will be deleted. This currently can not be undone.

users.delete: Are you sure you want to delete user: {user}
users.deleteConfirm: All {count} of its permissions will be deleted. This currently can not be undone.

nodes.contexts: Click to edit the contexts for this node
nodes.copy: Copy {count} node to... | Copy {count} nodes to...
nodes.move: Move {count} node to... | Move {count} nodes to...
nodes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} permission node? | Are you sure you want to delete {count} permission nodes?

tracks.tip: Tip: click and drag to re-order the track
tracks.name: Track name

error.title: Loading error
error.info: Either the URL was copied wrong or the session has expired.
error.new: Please generate another editor session with {command}.

unsupported.title: Unsupported version
unsupported.info: Please {download} the latest version of LuckPerms to use the Web Editor

verbose.filterDesc: The string used to filter the output
